TopicTitle: [FORUM GAME] Rate the avatar of the person above you.

Articles.Content:
8/10 Cute avatar, though I don't know the character even after reading your explanation.

Overfloater: Turn the flame back on! I loled at the change though.

7/10 noticeable, but can't help but wonder where's it from.

...turn on what flame? a forum-flame?
0/10. Would prefer literally anything to ponies, but the rocket was sweet.

Nooo! The Floater is gone!

Also, 7/10
7/1- Spartaaaaaa....... reference, but its a fair bit small.

8/10 Looks like an old-school 8-bit game or something.

Edit for Starwhip: It's not a reference to anything really. I found a pic of a crown and got someone on the forums to make a flag out of it for me. I liked it enough to use it as my avatar. (Thanks, Cpt. Kipard, if you read this.)

Edited September 10, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

'Tis a crown, sir.

Not quite sure what that means. I'd give it a 3/10, personally, but if it is a reference it is totally lost on me.

Dragon! 8/10

*braces against 0/10 posts against my avatar*

9/10

I may watch the occasional episode
0/10 Once you have watched an episode, you are forever on the dark side IMO.
2/10 I can't see anything, but s/ its not a pony! /ends

Overfloater's GG rating returns to 12/10 for turning the engine back on.

My opinion on ponies has already been adequately declared.
7/10 Looks really cool

.0000000001/10

Would be a zero but it is a train So low because of it not being a solar powered maglev.
0/10. ERROR: No avatar detected.

.0000000001/10

Would be a zero but it is a train So low because of it not being a solar powered maglev.

Everyone knows the HypeTrain is a HypeSteam powered engine.

I'm personally for upgrading to a HypeNuclear powered maglev, but leading minds in the field aren't sure if thermal HypeReactors are even a thing yet. If they are, though, Hype-powered flight is just around the corner.

10/10 for dragons in Starwhip's avatar!

Everyone knows the HypeTrain is a HypeSteam powered engine.

HypeSteam is made by burning HypeCoal?

8/10
